metadata.notes: Mental Model: The Demand Flywheel - Free article on our approach

athenaPrompt: Want to explore demand creation thinking? Chat?

body.text: Most businesses optimise for serving demand that already exists. We focus on creating demand that doesn't yet existâ€”or exposing latent demand that competitors haven't seen. Rolex doesn't sell watches. Peloton doesn't sell bikes. Slack doesn't sell chat. They sell status, tribe membership, professional identity. Your product is the excuse. The demand is primal.
